title: Displaying your live activity from (almost) every website on your own webpage w/ NextJS and Redis
excerpt: Here's a nice touch for your portfolio website or next social app - what if users could see what you were doing, right now? Maybe you're watching a specific song on YouTube. Editing a specific file in Github Codespaces. Watching anime on a pirating site.

title: Hello World, I Guess We're Doing This
